Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/DateTime/incrementYears
Synopsis Increment the years by given amount or by 1.
Function
  1. datetime incrementYears(datetime dt, int n)
  2. datetime incrementYears(datetime dt)
Usage import DateTime;
Examples 
rascal>import DateTime;
ok
rascal>N = now();
datetime: $2012-09-04T14:05:02.590+0200
rascal>incrementYears(N);
datetime: $2013-09-04T14:05:02.590+0200
rascal>incrementYears(N, 5);
datetime: $2017-09-04T14:05:02.590+0200
[Edit] | [New Subconcept] | [Recompile Course] | [Warnings]
